title: The difference between Silver and Platinum
body:
Is so noticable and huge it is disgusting.

I played roughly 15 games on an alt (won't name which alt) and won about 14 of them on my silver 5 account.

Now I am trying to switch back into gear on here (plat 1/2 mmr) and it feels so much different. People in this elo actually dodge stuff, have great micro mechanics. The decision making still feels lacking which i'm coming to realize is what separates this elo from the real high elos. But just the sheer mechanics and gameplay are so huge.

Just had to say it.
